trans-unit.source: Manages the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> objects for any object that inherits from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce la raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> oggetti per qualsiasi oggetto che eredita il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Each Windows Form has at least one BindingContext object that manages the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the form.
trans-unit.target: Ogni Windows Form dispone di almeno un oggetto BindingContext che gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>oggetti per il form.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is abstract, the return type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property is either a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe è astratta, il tipo restituito della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>proprietà è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>o un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the <xref:System.Type> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'origine dati è un oggetto che può restituire solo una singola proprietà (anziché un elenco di oggetti), <xref:System.Type>è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si specifica un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>come origine dati, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>viene restituito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: D'altra parte, se l'origine dati è un oggetto che implementa <xref:System.Collections.IList>o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>viene restituito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni origine dati in un Windows Form, è disponibile un unico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the BindingContext enables you to retrieve any particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associated with a data source.
trans-unit.target: Poiché possono essere presenti più origini dati associate a un Windows Form, BindingContext consente di recuperare qualsiasi particolare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>associata a un'origine dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property, the BindingContext creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>proprietà BindingContext crea un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>Se non ne esiste già.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend.
trans-unit.target: Questo può causare confusione, come l'oggetto restituito non può gestire l'elenco (o qualsiasi elenco) che si desidera.

trans-unit.source: To prevent returning an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the intended <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare di restituire un oggetto non valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>per determinare se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>esiste già.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: If you use a container control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, to contain data-bound controls, you can create a BindingContext for just that container control and its controls.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza un controllo contenitore, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, per contenere i controlli con associazione a dati, è possibile creare un oggetto BindingContext solo per tale contenitore e i relativi controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, ogni parte del modulo può essere gestiti dalla relativa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor for more information about creating multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>costruttore per ulteriori informazioni sulla creazione di più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>oggetti per la stessa origine dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the BindingContext of that form.
trans-unit.target: Se si aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>il controllo a un form e associarlo a una colonna di una tabella in un set di dati, il controllo comunica con BindingContext del modulo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The BindingContext, in turn, talks to the specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for that data association.
trans-unit.target: BindingContext, a sua volta comunica con la specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>per tale associazione dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: If you queried the `Position` property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, it would report the current record for the binding of that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una query di `Position` proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, viene registrato il record corrente per l'associazione di tale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the BindingContext for the form it is on.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>è associato al `FirstName` colonna di un `Customers` tabella il `dataSet1` set di dati tramite BindingContext per il form a cui appartiene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```c# textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` You can add a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```c# textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ```È possibile aggiungere un secondo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo (`TextBox2`) al form e associarlo al `LastName` colonna il `Customers` tabella nel set di dati stesso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The BindingContext is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`).
trans-unit.target: BindingContext è compatibile con la prima associazione (`TextBox1` a `Customers.FirstName`), quindi viene utilizzato lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, mentre entrambe le caselle di testo sono associate allo stesso set di dati (`DataSet1`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```c# textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the BindingContext creates and manages a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```c# textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ```Se si associa `TextBox2` un set di dati diverso, BindingContext crea e gestisce un secondo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: It is important to be consistent about how you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> properties; otherwise, the BindingContext creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors.
trans-unit.target: È importante essere coerente sulla modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>proprietà; in caso contrario, BindingContext crea più gestori della valuta per il set di dati stesso, causando errori.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated BindingContext objects.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente mostra alcuni modi per impostare le proprietà e dei relativi oggetti BindingContext.

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare le proprietà utilizzando uno dei metodi seguenti, purché siano coerenti in tutto il codice.

trans-unit.source: ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > Most Windows Forms applications bind through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb# ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```c# comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE]> Eseguire l'associazione tramite un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> la maggior parte delle applicazioni Windows Form

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component encapsulates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> programming interface.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>componente incapsula un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>ed espone il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>interfaccia di programmazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> for binding, you should use the members exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the BindingContext.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>per l'associazione, è necessario utilizzare i membri esposti dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>per modificare la "valuta" (ovvero, `Position`) piuttosto che scorrere BindingContext.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instances for the same data source, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and set it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of an object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera disporre di più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>istanze per la stessa origine dati, creare una nuova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>e impostarla per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>proprietà di un oggetto che eredita dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects (from two different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects), you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to different values.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispone di due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>oggetti (da due diversi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>oggetti), è possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>su valori diversi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo ogni set di controlli con associazione a dati per visualizzare valori diversi dalla stessa origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associata a un'origine dati specifica alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associata a un'origine dati specifica alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: dataSource is .
trans-unit.target: dataSourceis .

trans-unit.source: -or- listManager is .
trans-unit.target: -or- listManager is .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta di qualsiasi <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: Genera sempre un <xref:System.NotImplementedException>quando gestito.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: The CollectionChanged event is obsolete and always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: L'evento CollectionChanged è obsoleto e genera sempre un <xref:System.NotImplementedException>quando gestito.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> contiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using only a data source.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>proprietà per informazioni sulla restituzione di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>utilizzando solo un'origine dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'origine dati.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> contiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associata all'origine dati specificata e il membro dati.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using a data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>proprietà per informazioni sulla restituzione di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>utilizzando un'origine dati e un membro dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'origine dati.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The information needed to resolve to a specific <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni necessarie per risolvere in uno specifico <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> that is associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> you want does not require a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>si desidera che non richiede un percorso di navigazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects that use an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, no navigation path is required.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>gestisce un set di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>gli oggetti che utilizzano un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, è richiesto alcun percorso di navigazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Item property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, and never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Articolo la proprietà restituisce sempre un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>e non restituiscono mai `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dati associata a un particolare <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> for the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> per l'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> that is associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associato all'origine dati specificata e al membro.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects for which the data source contains multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>gestisce un set di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>oggetti per cui l'origine dati contenente più oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain several <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects linked by <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>può contenere diversi <xref:System.Data.DataTable>oggetti collegati da <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>oggetti.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il percorso di navigazione è richiesto per consentire di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>restituire il corretto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Item property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, when the `dataMember` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Articolo la proprietà restituisce sempre un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, quando il `dataMember` parametro è valido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: It will never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Non restituisce mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>gestisce un elenco, anche il percorso di navigazione deve terminare con un elenco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code binds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the order date in a table of orders.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il codice c# seguente associa un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controllo alla data dell'ordine in una tabella orders.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The navigation path includes the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Include il percorso di navigazione di <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>e <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> must be retrieved using only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (which resolves to a list).
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>deve essere recuperato utilizzando solo il <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>e <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>(che viene risolta in un elenco).</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` When returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, you should use the same data source as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> and modify only the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ```Quando viene restituito un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>è necessario utilizzare la stessa origine dati <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>e modificare solo il percorso di navigazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>per determinare se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>esiste già.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dati associata a un particolare <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A navigation path containing the information that resolves to a specific <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un percorso di navigazione contenente le informazioni che si risolve in uno specifico <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> for the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> per l'origine dati specificata e il membro.

trans-unit.source: The specified dataMember does not exist within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Specificato dataMember non esiste nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCollectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnCollectionChanged consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dati è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: L'origine dati è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection into a specified array, starting at the collection index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi della raccolta in una matrice specificata, a partire dall'indice della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Array>cui copiare.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The collection index to begin copying from.
trans-unit.target: Indice della raccolta ha inizio la copia da.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> objects managed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero totale di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> gli oggetti gestiti dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of data sources managed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di origini dati gestite dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è sincronizzata.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta è thread-safe. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object to use for synchronization (thread safety).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto da utilizzare per la sincronizzazione (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore per la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method allows you to iterate over the collection managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>Come risultato di IEnumerable. GetEnumerator metodo consente di scorrere la raccolta gestita da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>per la raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Associates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> with a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Associa un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> con un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended update the bindings of components that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, when their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> changes.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve aggiornare le associazioni dei componenti che implementano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, quando i relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>le modifiche.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> da associare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> da associare il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>.
